DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine DM II patient efficacy Crestor obtain new European LDL cholesterol guideline .
DOC.brief_title: DIALOOG : Crestor Patients With Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 : Lowering LDL-C Levels New European Guidelines
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 , LDLC > 2,5 mmol/l , cholesterol lower medication use last 3 month , start Crestor 10 mg , permission use patient data AZ
